column1: There was a king long ago in Ireland. He had three sons
column2: and one of them was something silly. There came a sickness on the king
column3: and he called his three sons. He said to them that he had knowledge the only thing would cure him was the apples from Burnett's orchard. So he bade them to go look for them
column4: for that orchard was in some far-away place
column5: and no one could tell where it was.The three sons went then
column9: and went on till they came to three crossroads. They went on till they came to three crossroads. There they stopped
column10: and they settled among themselves that each one of them would take one of the roads and go searching for the apples
column11: and they would meet at the same place at the end of a year and a day.
